info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 3:56PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Cochise County through 430 PM MST... At 355 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Naco, or 8 miles west of Bisbee, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hereford, Naco and Palominas. This includes Route 92 between mile markers 339 and 352. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
